title: Hooligans
overview: Meni Azulai, who arrives at Teddy Stadium every Saturday with a supermarket cart. Not for the game itself, Meni isn't even a football fan. He's a lone wolf with an explosive temperament. Though the game doesn't interest him, when he saves a man who turns out to be the leader of the club's radical fan organization, the police force him to become an undercover agent against his will.
